channel.description: Recent content in CondMatter I on Modulhandbuch Physik/Astronomie der Universität Bonn

item.title: CondMatter I
item.description: Condensed Matter Physics I - CondMatter I Course Condensed Matter Physics I Course No. CondMatter I Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 3+1 6 WT Requirements: Preparation: Basic knowledge in condensed matter physics and quantum mechanics Form of Testing and Examination: Oral or written examination Length of Course: 2 semesters Aims of the Course: Comprehensive introduction to the basic principles of solid state physics and to some experimental methods.

item.title: CondMatter I
item.description: Condensed Matter Physics I - CondMatter I Course Condensed Matter Physics I Course No. CondMatter I Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 3+1 6 WT Requirements for Participation: Preparation: Basic knowledge in condensed matter physics and quantum mechanics Form of Testing and Examination: Oral or written examination Length of Course: 2 semesters Aims of the Course: Comprehensive introduction to the basic principles of solid state physics and to some experimental methods.
